abstract: North Korea's plan to put weather satellite into orbit using rocket resembling prototypical long-range ballistic missile worries experts, who doubt state news agency claims that program's aims are peaceful.
lead_paragraph: The launch is officially to put a new weather satellite in orbit, but the United States and allies see the rocket as a nascent intercontinental ballistic missile.

headline.main: North Korea Plans Rocket Launch That Could Lead to Missile
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: Plan to Launch Rocket Raises Speculation on Ballistic Missiles

snippet: The launch is officially to put a new weather satellite in orbit, but the United States and allies see the rocket as a nascent intercontinental ballistic missile.
